title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4208.10 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4208.10 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) A nonrefundable
application fee of $250 must be paid to the corporation before final review of
an application can be completed. (b) The corporation will assess an administrative fee of up to 1.5 percent of the
project loan or interest subsidy grant, payable by the borrower at or prior to
closing. The corporation may allocate the administrative fee to cover
project-related expenses it deems appropriate. Such allocation may include
sharing a portion of the administrative fee with a municipality, industrial
development agency, local development corporation, or other not-for-profit
entity that has assisted the corporation or the applicant in preparing or
processing the application for assistance or in closing the project. In
addition, the applicant will be obligated to pay for expenses incurred by the
corporation and related to the project including, but not limited to, expenses
related to appraisals, surveys, title insurance and other requirements deemed
appropriate by the corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

4208.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
